results.title: Metformin treatment confers protection of the optic nerve following photoreceptor degeneration
results.text_hl: This suggests the protective role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in preventing @DISEASE_Optic_Nerve_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D020221 @@@optic nerve damage@@@ secondary to retinal @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016388 @@@photoreceptor loss@@@.

citations.NLM: Eltony SA, Mohaseb HS, Sayed MM, Ahmed AA. Metformin treatment confers protection of the optic nerve following photoreceptor degeneration Anat Cell Biol. 2021 Jun 30;54(2):249-258. PMID: 34162765
citations.BibTeX: @article{34162765, title={Metformin treatment confers protection of the optic nerve following photoreceptor degeneration}, author={Eltony SA and Mohaseb HS and Sayed MM and Ahmed AA}, journal={Anat Cell Biol}, volume={54}, number={2}, pages={249-258}}

results.title: Metformin Protects Auditory Hair Cells from Gentamicin-Induced Toxicity in vitro.
results.text_hl: These results suggest a protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on auditory HC survival in @CHEMICAL_Gentamicins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005839 @@@gentamicin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016388 @@@HC loss@@@ in vitro.

citations.NLM: Glutz A, Leitmeyer K, Setz C, Brand Y, Bodmer D. Metformin Protects Auditory Hair Cells from Gentamicin-Induced Toxicity in vitro. Audiol Neurootol. 2015;20(6):360-9. PMID: 26372952
